definition: marked by deliberate deceptiveness, especially by pretending one set of feelings and acting under the influence of another
details:
adjective
- marked by deliberate deceptiveness, especially by pretending one set of feelings and acting under the influence of another
= example: marked by deliberate deceptiveness, especially by pretending one set of feelings and acting under the influence of another
= synonyms: Janus-faced
- intended to deceive
= example: intended to deceive
= synonyms: fallacious
